title: Homilies on S. Ignatius and S. Babylas.
author: St. John Chrysostom

paragraphs.text: Homilies on S. Ignatius and S. Babylas.
Translated with Introduction and Notes by Rev. W. R. W. Steophens, M.a., Prebendary of Chichester, and Rector of Woolbeding, Sussex.
Assistd by Rev. T. P. Brandram, M.a., Rector of Rumboldswhyke, Chichester.
